snippet: In a new memoir, Leon E. Panetta draws a largely respectful portrait of a president who follows a “well-reasoned vision for the country” but also “misses opportunities.”
abstract: Leon Panetta book Worthy Fights: A Memoir of Leadership in War and Peace offers blunt account of his time in the Obama administration; Panetta draws largely respectful portrait of Pres Obama, but is critical of some of Obama's decisions.
lead_paragraph: In a new memoir, Leon E. Panetta draws a largely respectful portrait of a president who follows a “well-reasoned vision for the country” but also “misses opportunities.”

headline.main: In Book, Panetta Recounts Frustration With Obama
headline.print_headline: In Book, Panetta Recounts Frustration With Obama
